name: InfoCard
description: The InfoCard is used to give the user more information than a message box. It can also be used to give useful tips.

props.name: text
props.doc: The text content of the InfoCard, displayed/rendered in a paragraph. To fully customize the content, see `children` property.

props.name: dropShadow
props.doc: Sets the drop shadow of the info card. Defaults to `true`.

props.name: stretch
props.doc: Stretch the card to fill the container.

props.name: className
props.doc: Custom className for the component root.

props.name: icon
props.doc: Custom icon. Defaults to the `lightbulb` icon.

props.name: imgProps
props.doc: [Image properties](/uilib/elements/image) applied to the `img` element if the component is used to display an image.

props.name: alt
props.doc: Used in combination with `src` to provide an alt attribute for the image element.

props.name: src
props.doc: Specifies the path to the image.

props.name: skeleton
props.doc: If set to `true`, an overlaying skeleton with animation will be shown. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: closeButtonAttributes
props.doc: Define any valid Eufemia [Button properties](/uilib/components/button/properties) or HTML attribute inside an object.

props.name: acceptButtonAttributes
props.doc: Define any valid Eufemia [Button properties](/uilib/components/button/properties) or HTML attribute inside an object.

props.name: children
props.doc: Can be used to add custom content, which is displayed/rendered between the `text` property and buttons.

events.name: onAccept
events.doc: Will be called when user clicks the accept button.

events.name: onClose
events.doc: Will be called when user clicks the close button.
